mapper.select: SELECT id, dept_name AS deptName FROM tb_dept ORDER BY id
SELECT id, dept_name AS deptName, tel, email, `desc` FROM tb_dept WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT COUNT (*) FROM ( SELECT d.id FROM tb_dept d LEFT JOIN tb_user u ON u.dept_id=d.id AND u.status=1 WHERE 1=1
AND d.dept_name LIKE '%${deptName}%'
GROUP BY d.id ) AS temp
